item.title: Sorry, Clint Eastwood, But The Best Western One-Liner Belongs To Charles Bronson
item.description: Though Clint Eastwood has an almost endless list of great Western quotes, the single best one-liner in the genre was delivered by Charles Bronson.

item.title: Superman Movie Lawsuit Escalates As Creator's Estate Makes New Move In Attempt To Block James Gunn Movie From Releasing In Certain Countries
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery continues to face legal trouble with James Gunn's Superman movie, as the film could be facing issues with its summer release.

item.title: Gandalf Forgetting The Blue Wizards In The Hobbit Has A Canon Explanation Thanks To Tolkien
item.description: Gandalf (Ian McKellen) forgot the names of the Blue Wizards in Peter Jackson's The Hobbit movies, and there is a canon reason for that.
